item.title: Breaking apart Monoliths: 4 Issues with scheduled deployments
item.description: For the last few years I’ve been on a journey of breaking down a monolith application. A common occurrence with monolithic and legacy applications are a painfully slow release cycle.

item.title: Creating your own website part 4: Adding Travis deployment
item.description: Now you have your site setup and you want those updates to flow out asap.

item.title: Creating your own website part 3: Using https with AWS and Cloudfront.
item.description: There is no reason NOT to be using HTTPS. So add it.

item.title: IIS 10 Windows Fall Creators Update (1709): Cannot read \\?\ configuration file
item.description: So you've installed Windows update 1709 and now your IIS hosted website isn't working?

item.title: Microservice mistakes part 1: Push vs Pull vs Pub/Sub
item.description: An exploration into the pain behind different distributed system models.

item.title: React router with Cloudfront and S3
item.description: React router isn't automatically supported with S3 + Cloudfront. This is how you can make it work.

item.title: Creating your own website part 2: Setting up a static website with AWS
item.description: The way I host this website is via AWS. It’s pretty cheap to host and can be set up for free.

item.title: Creating your own website part 1: The build and design of the site
item.description: I decided it was time for me to build my own website and publish it to my own domain. I think it’s something that every developer should try.
